summary: This bill, the "Developing and Advancing Innovative Learning Models Act," aims to support the development and adoption of innovative learning models in elementary and secondary schools. It establishes grant programs under the Institute of Education Sciences to fund research, development, and implementation of these models, alongside grants to states and local educational agencies to facilitate early adoption and expansion. The bill defines "innovative learning model" and sets standards for grant recipients, emphasizing evidence-based practices and data privacy. It also mandates reporting and evaluation to assess the effectiveness of these programs.
